name: Helm of dimensional travel
data: It increases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users wisdom pathetically.
It increases the users intelligence a good amount.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
The wearer of this helm can sense all incoming dimensional travel,
and is able to construct dimensional portals as long as the helm
